name: Baked Tilapia
ingredients: 1 pound tilapia fillets, thawed if frozen

instructions.en: Line a rimmed baking sheet with heavy duty foil and spray with cooking spray.
Arrange the fish in a single layer on the baking sheet.
Season the fish on both sides with garlic powder, Spicy Seasoning Salt, salt, and pepper.
Pour the melted butter over the fillets.
Bake at 425Â°F for about 8-10 minutes, just until opaque. Do not overcook.
Serve with the browned buttery pan juices.

notes: This recipe can be frozen for later use. Be careful not to overcook the fish to maintain its texture and flavor. The browned buttery pan juices add extra flavor to the dish.
